recommend.intent: Yes, I have a song in mind!
recommend.start: Great, let's answer the following questions to submit it!
recommend.cancel: Your recommendation has been cancelled. To recommend a song, click on one of the stories previously.
recommend.select: What song would you like to recommend? Please type in the following format: Song Name - Artist
recommend.explain: Why do you recommend this song? To redo your recommendation, type /redo. To cancel, type /cancel
recommend.dedicate: Any message for the user? If you don't have any, type 'No'. To redo your recommendation, type /redo. To cancel, type /cancel
recommend.deliver: Thanks! Your recommendation has just been delivered.
recommend.sub: You've just re-subscribed to receive daily song requests. Ahoy!
recommend.subExist: You've already subscribed to receive daily song requests. Hooray!
recommend.unsub: You've just unsubscribed to receive daily song requests. To re-subscribe, type /sub
recommend.unsubExist: You've already unsubscribed to receive daily song requests. To re-subscribe, type /sub

ask.intent: We're still currently testing this feature. If you want to enjoy early access, you can /join our waiting list. If not, type /no
ask.join: Thank you for indicating your interest! We'll notify you once it's launched :)
ask.joinExist: You've already indicated your interest! We'll notify you once it's launched :)
ask.decline: No worries. If you want to join the waiting list again, type /ask
ask.default: To /join or /no to join? That's the question hmm.

basic.timeout: Oh man, your session has timed out. Start again by clicking on one of the stories previously!
basic.default: Start by responding to a song request from another user! Otherwise, you can also request for a song recommendation from others by typing /ask
basic.start: Hey, I'm Charlie, your assistant to share a song with other users. Well of course, you've already knew me!
basic.welcome: Hey I'm Charlie! I'll send you a request daily and be your assistant to recommend music to others!
